full_text: GLa ae eae 2024/KER/4916 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MRS. JUSTICE SOPHY THOMAS MONDAY, THE 22%? pay oF JANUARY 2024 / 2ND MAGHA, 1945 CRL.MC NO. 652 OF 2024 CRIME NO.111/2011 OF CBCID, ERNAKULAM, Ernakulam SC 682/2023 OF II ADDITIONAL DISTRICT COURT, ERNAKULAM CP 36/2022 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS - I, NORTH PARAVUR PETITIONER/ACCUSED NO.5: PUTHUKKATTU PARFEKUTTY ALIYAR, AGED 71 YEARS, S/O PAREEKUTTY , ALZARA, PUTHUKKATTU HOUSE, A M ROAD, PERUMBAVOOR, ERNAKULAM, PIN - 683540. BY ADV P.A.MUJEEB RESPONDENT /COMPLAINANT : STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, PIN - 682031. PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.PRASANTH M.P. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 22.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl.M.C.No.652/2024 2 SOD4IKERIMOIG ORDER The petitioner herein is the 5th accused in Crime No.111/CR/EKM/2011, CBCID, Ernakulam, invoking inherent jurisdiction of this Court under Section 482 of CrP.C. for a direction for an early disposal of SC No.682 of 2023, pending before the IInd Additional District and Sessions Court, Ernakulam. 2. Learned counsel for the petitioner would submit that the petitioner is a 71 year old man, and so trial of the case has to be expedited for disposing it on an early date. 3. Learned Public Prosecutor would point out that the sessions case is of the year 2023 and so, the trial court may not be able to give an early posting for this case, superseding the old cases pending consideration of that court. 4. Since the petitioner is aged 71 years, the trial court has to see whether any priority can be given to that case for disposal on an early date, as he is a senior citizen. eae serait Crl.M.C.No.652/2024 3 D024/KERIA916 Hence, directing the trial court to consider the request of the petitioner (A5) for early disposal of SC No.682 of 2023, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of. Sd/- SOPHY THOMAS JUDGE DSV/- ler Fes Eel Tl.M.C.No.652/2024 4 ani C C.No.652/ 2024/KER/4916 APPENDIX OF CRL.MC 652/2024 PETITIONER S ANNEXURES : Annexure Al COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN S.C.No.682/2023 BEFORE THE 2ND ADDITIONAL SESSIONS COURT, ERNAKULAM DATED 08.12.2022. Annexure A2 THE TRUE COPY OF THE MEDICAL CERTIFICATE. RESPONDENT S ANNEXURES : NIL
